scorers.name: Canadian Salad
scorers.description: Canadian Salad is a trick-taking card game where players try to avoid specific “bad” cards and tricks across multiple rounds, with the lowest total score winning.

scorers.name: Five Crowns
scorers.description: Five Crowns is a rummy-style card game where players build runs and sets over 11 rounds using rotating wild cards and five suits, aiming for the lowest total score.
